OgreMax - 3DS Max Exporter and Viewer

About OgreMax

OgreMax is a collection of tools and programs for use with the Ogre 3D rendering engine. It is composed of:
  • 3DS Max Scene Exporter - A plugin for 3DS Max that exports scenes, meshes, and material scripts.
  • Viewer - A single-window application that displays scenes and meshes generated by the exporter.
  • WinViewer - A multi-window application that displays scenes and meshes generated by the exporter.

The OgreMax home page can be found at www.ogremax.com.

Who Made This?

OgreMax was created by Derek Nedelman.
